/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of greenery over the urban landscape. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active transportation system. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
